attributes.action: Mixed EU nationality families' rights must be protected in both countries
attributes.background: Being an EU member nation for 40 years has brought together hundreds of thousands of couples of mixed UK / other EU nationality citizens.  Many of these are married with children. The rights of these families to switch between either country without penalty must be protected post Brexit.

rejection.details: We think this petition is similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/135700
